title: 6.1.6 Create docker-compose for local development
body:
## Parent Issue
#23 - 6.1 Container Packaging

## Objective
Create docker-compose setup for local development with all dependencies.

## Requirements
- PostgreSQL database
- Redis (optional)
- LocalStack for AWS services
- Hot reload for development
- Volume mounts for code

## Files to Create
- `docker/docker-compose.yml`
- `docker/docker-compose.dev.yml`
- `docker/docker-compose.test.yml`
- `docker/Dockerfile.dev`

## Implementation

```yaml
# docker/docker-compose.yml
version: '3.8'

services:
  app:
    build:
      context: ..
      dockerfile: docker/Dockerfile
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://co:password@postgres:5432/cloud_optimizer
      - REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis

  postgres:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: co
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: password
      POSTGRES_DB: cloud_optimizer
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"

  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"

  localstack:
    image: localstack/localstack:latest
    environment:
      - SERVICES=s3,sts,iam,ce
    ports:
      - "4566:4566"

volumes:
  postgres_data:
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] docker-compose up starts all services
- [ ] App connects to database
- [ ] Hot reload works in dev mode
- [ ] LocalStack available for AWS testing
- [ ] Clean shutdown with docker-compose down

## Estimated Time
2 hours
